com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite

Interface SqliteHelperFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SqliteHelperFactoryImpl

    public interface SqliteHelperFactory

    Defines factory methods for SQLite component dependencies. This interface and its implementations are intended to be used internally by the framework.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 07/25/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Method Detail

      • createCriteria

        <T> SqliteCriteria<T> createCriteria(SqliteSession session,
                                   java.lang.Class<T> entityClass,
                                   SqlBuilder sqlBuilder,
                                   SqliteMapper mapper)
                                 throws InfinitumRuntimeException
        Constructs a new SqliteCriteria.
        Parameters:
        session - the SqliteSession this SqliteCriteria is attached to
        entityClass - the Class to create SqliteCriteria for
        sqlBuilder - SqlBuilder for generating SQL statements
        mapper - the SqliteMapper to use for Object mapping
        Throws:
        InfinitumRuntimeException - if entityClass is transient

      • createSqliteDbHelper

        SqliteDbHelper createSqliteDbHelper(InfinitumContext context,
                                  SqliteMapper mapper)
        Creates a new SqliteDbHelper.
        Parameters:
        context - the InfinitumContext to create the SqliteDbHelper with
        mapper - the SqliteMapper to create the SqliteDbHelper with
        Returns:
        SqliteDbHelper

      • createSqliteModelFactory

        ModelFactory createSqliteModelFactory(SqliteSession session,
                                    SqliteMapper mapper)
        Creates a new ModelFactory.
        Parameters:
        session - the SqliteSession this SqliteCriteria is attached to
        mapper - the SqliteMapper to use for Object mapping
        Returns:
        SqliteModelFactory
